pinginfodescription: Returns the ping and heartbeat of the bot.
levelImportconfirm:
Are you sure you want to import the XP and level progress for this server from Mee6?
All current level progress will be lost!

Please reply with 'y' to confirm or 'n' to abort in the next 15 seconds.
levelImportnodata: Error: It looks like Mee6 has no XP/Level progress data for this guild!
levelImportdatafound: Found XP/Level progress of useramount users! Writing data into database...
levelImportfinished:
Successfully imported data! I now have XP/Level data of useramount users from this server in my database.
Checkout the leaderboard:
levelImportinfodescription: Imports your servers XP and Levels from Mee6 to continue with your progress with this level system.
levelResetuserconfirm:
Are you sure that you want to reset the XP and level progress of user username (userid)?
This step cannot be reversed.

Please reply with 'y' to confirm or 'n' to abort in the next 15 seconds.
levelResetusernotfound: Error: I was unable to find an database entry for this user!
levelResetconfirm:
Are you sure that you want to reset the XP and level progress of every user on this server?
This step cannot be reversed.

Please reply with 'y' to confirm or 'n' to abort in the next 15 seconds.
levelResetfinished: XP and level progress of useramount user(s) was reset successfully.
levelResetinfodescription: Resets the XP, level and message count of every or one specific user on this server back to 0.
